r.d: An interface for accessing Facebook's web services API at http://api.facebook.com.
r.n: * Added new auth endpoints. * Added new modifications to notification.send(). * Added new feed endpoints. * Added get and set for api url to allow use of beta and connect api urls * Additions to fix Bug #14351 * Thanks to Matt Fonda for the patches! * Applied patch for fix regarding PEAR Bug #14361. Undefined variable in __get. * Fixed bug for undefined varible $url in Services_Facebook_Common::sendRequest(). Fixes #14349.
